about_the_game:
Witchcraft: Spellbound Decks is a roguelike deckbuilder where you dive into the arcane arts to craft the ultimate deck. Set in a mystical world where magic is real, you play as a fledgling witch, harnessing the power of spells and rituals to conquer a series of increasingly challenging enemies.

Experimentation is key in Witchcraft. Mix and match different card combinations to create powerful strategies. Do you go for raw power or rely on cunning tricks? Will you sacrifice a card for temporary gain, or play the long game and build an invincible deck? The choices are yours, and each run will be different, challenging you to adapt and evolve your tactics.

DANGEROUS CARD COMBAT
Engage in strategic battles where every move counts. Plan your actions carefully and outwit your enemies using a combination of powerful spells and cunning tactics. Utilizing your crafted deck, create devious synergies in thrilling card based combat as you become the most powerful witch in the land.

EXPLORE A MAGICAL WORLD
Navigate a dynamic map filled with branching paths and hidden secrets. Choose your route wisely as you encounter various challenges and rewards along the way. Experience a variety of random events that can turn the tide of your journey. Whether it's a helpful ally or a dangerous foe, these encounters will keep you on your toes. Face off against formidable bosses with unique abilities and clever strategies that only the most skilled witches can overcome.

GROW YOUR TOME OF POWER
Customize your deck by crafting new cards from ancient recipes. Combine elements to create powerful new spells and abilities that suit your playstyle. Visit mystical shops where you can buy specific cards. Spend your resources wisely to enhance your deck and improve your chances of survival.
